# Exam Results

```{r}
scores <- read.csv("data/scores.csv")
summary(scores$score)

barplot(scores$score, names.arg = scores$name,
        col = "skyblue", main = "Exam Scores",
        ylab = "Score")
```
---

### âœ… What happens when you render this
- It loads your `data/scores.csv`.  
- Prints a **summary table** of the scores.  
- Plots a **bar chart** of the scores.  
- Produces `report2.html` (by default in the same folder, unless you specify `output_file`).
